title: 🏰 הממלכה המתמטית 🏰
subtitle: המקום שבו מספרים מתעוררים לחיים ומתמטיקה היא קסומה!
card-infinity-description: גלו את המלון הקסום שתמיד יכול להכיל עוד אורחים, גם כשהוא מלא לגמרי! למדו על אינסוף דרך בעלי חיים חמודים וחד קרן נוצץ! ✨
infinity-subtitle: מלון קסום שיש בו מקום ל-כו-ל-ם!

single.1: 🦄 **Single Guest Adventure!** Our magical hotel has all rooms filled from 1 to infinity! But what happens when one new guest arrives? Click 'Start Story' to begin! ✨
single.2: Oh no! 🦄 A unicorn wants a room, but every single room is taken! How can we possibly fit one more guest when infinity rooms are full? The hotel manager has a brilliant idea! Click 'Show the Magic!' 🪄
single.3: ✨ **The Magic Happens!** Watch as every guest moves to the room with the next higher number! Guest in room 1→2, room 2→3, room 3→4, and so on! This frees up room 1! 🏠
single.4: 🎉 **Success!** The unicorn gets room 1, and everyone else still has a room! This shows us something amazing about infinity - even when you have infinitely many things, you can sometimes still add more! Click 'Next Step' to learn more! 🏨✨
single.5: 🎓 **You Did It!** You've learned that infinity + 1 = infinity! In math, this helps us understand how infinite sets work. Ready for a bigger challenge? Try the 'Bus Full of Guests' scenario! 🚌

bus.1: 🚌 **Bus Challenge!** Now let's try something harder! What if a whole bus full of 5 guests arrives at our infinitely full hotel? This seems impossible... or is it? Click 'Start Story'! 🤔
bus.2: 🚌 A tour bus arrives with 5 guests who all need rooms! But every room from 1 to infinity is still occupied! How can we fit 5 more guests? The hotel manager has an even more clever idea! Click 'Show the Magic!' ⭐
bus.3: 🎯 **Double Magic!** Watch as every guest moves to a room number that's DOUBLE their current room! Guest in room 1→2, room 2→4, room 3→6! This creates space in rooms 1, 3, 5, 7, 9... all the odd numbers! 🔢
bus.4: 🌟 **Incredible!** All 5 bus passengers get rooms 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5, while everyone else still has a room! We made space for 5 guests by being extra clever! Click 'Next Step'! 🎊
bus.5: 🧠 **Genius Level!** You've learned that infinity + 5 = infinity too! By doubling room numbers, we created infinite space! Ready for the ultimate challenge? Try 'Infinite Buses!' 🚌♾️

infinite.1: ♾️ **Ultimate Challenge!** Here comes the most mind-blowing scenario! What if INFINITE buses arrive, each with INFINITE guests? This seems absolutely impossible! Click 'Start Story' for the ultimate magic! 🤯
infinite.2: 🚌♾️ Infinite buses with infinite guests each arrive! That's infinity × infinity new guests wanting rooms! Every mathematician thinks this is impossible... but our hotel manager knows a secret! Click 'Show the Magic!' 🎭
infinite.3: 🔮 **Ultimate Magic!** The manager uses PRIME NUMBERS! All original guests move to prime-numbered rooms (2,3,5,7,11...). Then new guests get rooms using a special mathematical formula! 📐
infinite.4: 🌟 **Mind = Blown!** Every single guest (even infinity×infinity of them) gets their own room! This uses advanced math! Click 'Next Step'! 🎪
infinite.5: 🏆 **Mathematics Master!** You've discovered that some infinities can be bigger than others, but Hilbert's Hotel can still fit them all! You've learned one of the deepest secrets in mathematics! 🎓✨

card-fibonacci-description: Watch magical rabbits multiply in nature's most beautiful pattern! Discover the golden spiral that appears in flowers, shells, and galaxies! 🌻
